 - You can move around by holding Shift + Leftclick or by holding the middle mouse button

 - You can also zoom in and out using the mouse wheel.

 - In the top-left corner you can pick an algorithm to perform on the given data structure

 - During the operation of most algorithms this window will include more information such as Pseudo- or C++-Code, Variables and the Callstack.

 - You can close or open this window by clicking on the white triangle. However it will open itself if its of significance for the visualisation of the algorithm.
